features: Superior Nonstick Performance: 12 inch Redchef Ceramic Non Stick Frying Pans provides exceptional nonstick performance, allowing you to cook with less oil or butter. Food effortlessly slides off the surface, making it easy to flip, toss, and serve your delicious creations.

PFOA-Free Ceramic Coating Skillet: This Frying Pan with lid is coated with a PFOA-free ceramic nonstick coating, ensuring safe and healthy cooking for you and your family. Say goodbye to harmful chemicals and enjoy peace of mind while preparing your favorite meals.

Versatile and Deep Design: With its 12-inch diameter and deep sides, this ceramic frying pan with lid offers ample space for cooking a variety of dishes. From stir-fries to one-pan meals, the deep design allows for easy tossing and flipping without any spills or messes.

All-Stove Compatibility: Ceramic Frying Pan designed to be compatible with all stove types, including induction, this Nonstick Frying Pan is incredibly versatile. Whether you have a gas, electric, or induction stove, you can enjoy non stick frying pan exceptional performance and even heat distribution.

Durable and Easy to Clean: Ceramic Nonstick Frying Pan with lid is built to last. Crafted with a sturdy construction, it ensures durability for everyday cooking. Additionally, our ceramic nonstick coating makes cleanup a breeze. Simply wipe off any residue with a soft sponge or cloth, and it's ready for the next cooking adventure.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Redchef Healthy Ceramic Nontick Pan with Lid Redchef's ceramic nonstick coating is free of harmful chemicals such as PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium, ensuring that your meals are both healthier and easier to prepare.

Redchef Cookware Easy to Clean Nonstick ceramic surface prevents food from sticking, making cleanup a breeze with just a simple wipe or rinse. Redchef Cookware Versatile & Durable Designed to handle a wide range of cooking methods, from stove to oven, and even induction cooktops. Redchef Cookware Excellent Heat Transfer Advanced ceramic coating ensures even heat distribution across the surface of the pan, reducing hotspots and providing consistent cooking results

Previous page Healthy Cooking The ceramic coating on our pan is PFOA free, ensuring that you can cook your meals with confidence. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Budget alternative to the Ourplace Always pan
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised by the ceramic pan I recently purchased as a budget-friendly alternative to the OurPlace Always pan. Not only does it offer a similar non-stick surface for easy cooking and cleaning, but it also heats up evenly, ensuring my meals are perfectly cooked every time. While it may not have all the social media hype of the OurPlace pan, it's definitely a worthwhile option for those looking to save some money without compromising on quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best ceramic pan we have ever owned!!!
reviews.reviewText: WOW!!! We’ve had this pan for just a short time, but we literally use it 4-5 times a day. It’s solid! I’ve read that some people had a problem with shipping, and bent lids. Ours came in perfect condition, really well packaged for shipping. It arrived on time, and in perfect condition. It’s a beautiful pan, I love the color and look. It cooks, and cleans up easily, no sticking so far. We’ve ordered GreenLife ceramic pans before, and have been extremely disappointed. Redchef is hanging in there, so far so good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a really outstanding pan, it is truly non-stick, the food that you are cooking literally glides over the surface. I highly recommend this pan, it's very well made, it's got heavy metal plating, a great handle and looks like it's going to last a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'll keep this short and sweet. I've tried several "nonstick" pans before but this is the only one that has lived up to the claim so far. Nothing has stuck.I also like the flat bottom it is easier to clean compared to pans that have ridges or any significant texture on the bottom.Helpful hint: Never use nonstick spray on nonstick pans. The lecithin will eat away at the coating. If you want to use something for additional nonstick fortification or other reason, get your oil of choice and pour it yourself into spray or mist bottles you can get made for oil. Or use butter or crisco hey whatever it is that's your go-to use that...just not PAM or other premade spray unless it says it's 100% oil.Bonus points because it's pretty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Great pan, except the bottom. Not really dishwasher safe…
reviews.reviewText: This pan is great except if you put it in the dishwasher and then later clean it by hand, it turns everything black. Evidently the unfinished bottom of this pan reacts to something and leaches abundant black smear. We now have nice new yellow dish cloths with massive black stains from the undercarriage of this pan. Returning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this pan, light weight, nothing sticks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This one deserves the five stars that I am giving it.
reviews.reviewText: We have been avoiding teflon skillets for years, because they always end up flaking off, with us eating that toxic stuff! But we have been noticing that when we try to fry corned beef hash, all the tasty browned portion ends up bound to the bottom of our stainless skillet. Such a waste!So we finally ordered this in the 11" width. It browns the corned beef hash perfectly, with none sticking to the pan. I fixed chicken marsala in his pan and though the recipe warned that teflon skillets would not give good browning of the meat, this one gave excellent browning. The 11" width is perfect for all but the largest recipes, and I find it much lighter on the wrist, which is important for the elderly with arthitis. Lastly the bottom stays nice and flat when heated so it stays in good contact with my glass-top range, with no hot spots and very even heating. This fry pan is a real winner. I was not paid, nor given free or discounted product in return for this review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Remarkably good skillet
reviews.reviewText: I've had this 12" skillet for a few weeks now and have used it a number of times. I have no complains. The coating is fine, the non-stick quality seem solid, and cleanup has been ridiculously easy.In recent years, I've become a convert to ceramic pans (vs traditional teflon and similar "anodized" pans.)I don't know if this'll hold up in the long run, but currently I think it's marvelous and the Redshef brand in particular seems good quality.
